result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. ROBERT N KURUC JR

defendant.name: KURUC, ROBERT N, JR
defendant.address: 571 Cty Rd A, C/O Green Lake County Jail, Green Lake, WI 54941

records.addlTxt: Second appearance on November 22, 2022 at 01:45 pm.

3:10 PM Defendant ROBERT N KURUC JR in court, in custody.  Attorney Gerise Marie Laspisa in court for State of Wisconsin. Defendant states the defendant has not yet been appointed representation from the public defender's office. Defendant is in custody for other charges in addition to this case. Court states the Court will look at a court appointed attorney after the defendant is done with his other charges  on November 19, 2022. Court notes a motion has been filed to amend the bond. Statement by defendant regarding bond. Statement by DA Laspisa - objects to bond modification. Court denies motion to modify bond. Court sets Status of Counsel for November 22, 2022 at 1:45 PM . Court instructs defendant to submit something to the court stating she'll allow the defendant to live with her.

Court adjourned at 3:16 PM.
Inmate Request to the Court w/Motion for Bond Reduction (defendant's)
Second appearance on October 24, 2022 at 03:00 pm.

8:48 AM Defendant ROBERT N KURUC JR in court, in custody.  Attorney Gerise Marie Laspisa in court for State of Wisconsin. Defendant has contacted the public defender's office and does qualify. Defendant is waiting to be appointed counsel. Defendant requests bond reduction. Court notes bond will be addressed at the next hearing. Status of Counsel set for October 24, 2022 at 3:00 PM.

Court adjourned at: 8:49 AM.

records.descr: Waiver of time limits for preliminary hearing

records.addlTxt: Second appearance on October 4, 2022 at 08:45 am.

9:13 AM Defendant ROBERT N KURUC JR in court, in custody.  Attorney Gerise Marie Laspisa in court for State of Wisconsin. Defendant confirms receipt of the criminal complaint and waives reading. Court instructs the defendant of the maximum penalty on each count. Court instructs defendant of his/her right to an attorney.  DA makes bond recommendation. Court notes bond has been set. Defendant requests bond reduction. Court denies bond modification. Defendant states he qualifies for the public defender. Court instructs defendant regarding his right to a preliminary hearing. Defendant waives the time limits. Court will set for Status of Counsel October 4, 2022 at 8:45 AM.

Court adjourned at 9:15 AM
Defendant is to maintain absolute sobriety - not to possess or consume any alcohol, illegal drugs or prescription drugs without a valid prescription.  You may be randomly tested for compliance.

1:16 PM Defendant ROBERT N KURUC JR in court.  Attorney Scott Nelson in court for ROBERT N KURUC JR. Attorney Gerise Marie Laspisa in court for State of Wisconsin.  Court has reviewed a probable cause statement and finds probable cause that a crime may have been committed.  DA Laspisa states the complaint for this case is completed and just needs to be sworn. Atty Nelson makes bond recommendation. Statement by the Court. Court orders bond at $5,000 cash bond and conditions of: Defendant is to maintain absolute sobriety - not to possess or consume any alcohol, illegal drugs or prescription drugs without a valid prescription.  You may be randomly tested for compliance. Court sets initial appearance for September 20, 2022 at 9:00 AM.
